alert.note: Alert for Kahoolawe; Kipahulu; Maui Windward West; Molokai Southeast; Molokai Windward; South Haleakala; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Warning issued July 18 at 5:06AM HST until July 19 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR EAST FACING SHORES OF THE BIG ISLAND AND MAUI COUNTY TONIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY... .Tropical Storm Calvin will rapidly generate warning level surf tonight into Wednesday morning. Surf heights will quickly subside rest of Wednesday as Calvin moves further west and away from the Big Island. ...HIGH SURF WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously large and disorganized waves of 10 to 15 feet. * WHERE...Kahoolawe, Maui Windward West, Molokai Windward, Molokai Southeast, Windward Haleakala, Kipahulu and South Haleakala. * WHEN...From 6 PM tonight to 6 PM HST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...High. Expect very strong breaking waves and powerful currents. Waves breaking in channel entrances may make navigating the channels dangerous.
info.instruction: Stay away from the shoreline along the affected coasts. Be prepared for road closures. Postpone entering or leaving channels affected by the high surf until the surf subsides.

area.areaDesc: Kahoolawe; Kipahulu; Maui Windward West; Molokai Southeast; Molokai Windward; South Haleakala; Windward Haleakala
